titleStmt.title: Inscription of Tuol Ang Srah Theat (K. 910)

publicationStmt.authority: DHARMA This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

handDesc.p: The basic punctuation sign in this text is an ornate double daṇḍa written in one continuous movement, resembling an inverted S-shape. The name of the poet being made known in the text itself, it is possibile that the hand is that of the poet.

div.ab: śakāvadhī rāmagir(īṣubh)i(ś) śaśī mr̥gānvitaḥ soritakanyak(o g)uruḥ
div.p:
Aṁnoy· mratāñ· qnantasvāmi ta vraḥ kaṁmratāṅ· A(ñ·) śrīkedāreśvara $circleSmall kñuṁ vā sop· I vā ckap· I
vā juṅ· rot· I vā bhīnavaprīya I vā niṣpriti I vā saṁpur(·) toṅ· I vā Ada(h)· Aleṅ· I vā ta Aṁmr̥t· I
vā kavos· I vā mānudharmma I vā siddhiyātra I vā daśam(ī) I vā lābha I vā klaṅ· Aras[·] I
vā Aroka I vā velā I vā śiddhalakṣāra I vā dhakkarīsāra I vā vṅā Añ· cheda I ku sraṅe I
ku taIn(·) I ku taEt· I ku paOc· ple śalya I ku mah(ī) I ku prek· I ku vṅā nuvāhi I
ku sal(·) Añ· Eja I ku tmī sme I ku saptamī I ku dvādaśī I ku man· I ku A(nsa)ṁ I ku
maṇḍakī I ku vr̥[ddhī] I ku can· I ku niṣṭhala I vā mukhaprīti I ku k[m?](e)ṅ[· I] ku vrau (I) ku klaṅ· Aras(·) I
sre man· jauhv· nu śaṅkha ta vraḥ kaṁmratāṅ· Añ· tnal· moy· pāda Ai kanlaḥ vrai
mās II Ai tel· Aṁvol· mās· I sre Aṁvi ta poñ· vinayakirttī Ai teṁ ca-
nloṅ· mratāñ(·) duvau mās· II (Ai) sruk· sanre II slā te(ṁ) slik· I (t)oṅ· teṁ
200 karomma poñ· vimala soṅ· ktiṅ· toṅ· slā ta gui tel· Oy· Ukk· (t)i (te)l·
(po)ñ· soṅ· sru bhai 6 toṅ· 10+7 ca[nlek yu]gala yau 10+(7) prak· (k)ośa kaṭṭī II
pnaṅ· pranāla kaṭṭī {1} mās· makuṭa (l)iṅ· {6} bhai III prak· {3} ka-
{2} (saṁ)rit· laṅgau {3} hemā śa {3}ṅ· {4} (te)ṁ je bhai I {4}
kñuṁ kpoñ· kaṁmratā(ṅ·) ku (ka)dho {3}sa I ku laṅklaḥ I ku {3} (Aṁ)vai I ku ḍik· I {4}
ku pañjat· I ku sal· Aṁ {2} ku {2}t· {2}t· {2}l· I vā {15}
sre man· jau(hv·) n[u] C(ta)ma Ai sre (vr)ai {3}

app.note: Sic pour Aṁnoy·, par suite d'une espèce de sandhi.

div.p: The edition of GC does not include the first line of the inscription. It is indeed almost identical to the second line which is numbered 1. It seems that the first line was considered as a mistake by the scribe. To adjust to the edition of GC, we number the so-called mistake line, 0.
First edited by George Coedes (539-40) with a French translation; re-edited here by Dominique Soutif and Kunthea Chhom from estampage EFEO n. 1180.
